text: Controlling humans sense of taste is controlling the whole world!
Hey! Don‘t stick your fingers in!
People will get so tough when they have to fight for their most important Ramen!

Wherever Ramen is being made, gas is burning, the shadow of Ichiraku Ramen is shielding the village and pulling new noodles. A foodie‘s real power will only appear when he has to protect his most prec
The battle with the Underground Cooking Society has just began.
I‘m Jiraiya Sage, the handsome man who can shut up crying babies.
To gamble if a story is successful on its ending, even a failure is interesting!
It‘ll be sold out soon!
For Ninjas it‘s inconsequential how they live, how they die is what really matters.
Do you wanna see the latest Icha Icha manuscript? It‘s not for sale!
Come, put your thumb print here, then the contract is concluded!
Wow… 106cm…
You‘ll receive the right lead.
What is the real power?
Don‘t touch my beard!
The mutual trust and help among companions is the real source of power.
Smart birds can open the gate of their birdcage with their beak, because they never give up hope for freely soaring in the sky.
Well, bad luck for you, I‘m the examiner this year.
One more time and I‘ll disqualify you!
Torture starts now.
You lose!
People‘s eyes can be so frighteningly cold when they dislike someone and deny his existence.
It‘s not true that you would get the real power of the world after you obtain all Ninjutsus.
A Ninja‘s real power will appear when he needs to protect his most precious item.
Wherever leaves fly, fire burns.
My hat is not for sale.
Don‘t touch my forehead!
I said do not touch my forehead!
How dare you still touch me!
I‘m gonna beat you flat if you touch me again!
Everybody, enjoy watching my back this time!
Well, from now on we are rivals!
Body may die, but memory lasts forever
You must buy it. Because I‘m the fifth Hokage.
I count to 5. Buy them or I take your money by force!
Why is my father even a Hokage? He only sat behind his table every day with his douche face, if that‘s the case, anyone can be a Hokage!
I‘m not interested in being a Hokage!
I have an enemy that I want to defeat!
I will woek on my own way of Ninjutsu.
Give us money or I will burn the village down!
Stop it! You can‘t harm the village as long as I‘m still here!
Bushy Eyebrows! It‘s not your show time. Check my technique!
What about mine!
Your moves are not cool enough. Wait for mine!
Not bad. We need to work harder!
The rival is too strong… I can‘t take any more…
So unreliable… Don‘t worry Sakura, I‘m here for you.
Damn! Retreat!
Get lost quickly, next time you won‘t be this lucky.
Lee, you‘re so strong, I admire you!
Can‘t believe I lost to this Bushy Eyebrows. Even Sakura left with him…
Lee, get up, it‘s almost training time!
Today let‘s have a competition with Kakashi Class.
Hey foot-dragger, why did you draw on the faces of all the Hokage!
Because soon or later I‘ll become the next Hokage and surpass all of them!
There can only be one Hokage. Forget about it because I‘m better than you!
Naruto, why are you here for me instead of training?
I must show you one super powerful Ninjutsu! If it‘s successful, please let me graduate!
Sa…Sakura!
Bushy Eyebrows! Out of the way. The seat next to Sakura is mine!
Move away, both of you! I‘ll sit next to Sasuke.
I‘ve heard lots about you. Let‘s have a go.
What do you think you are doing? Nobody can treat Sasuke like this!
Make way, all of you! So troublesome.
Hahaha, got you!
Sorry master, I told him not to…
These are Jonins? I can‘t believe this…
Hmm, how should I put it… Well, the first impression you left me… Was very annoying…
Ok, let‘s introduce ourselves first!
Wait! Let the teacher go first!
My name is Hatake Kakashi. My favorite and least favorite things remain secret. Dream? Don‘t really have… Hobbies? Quite a few!
Ahh! Here comes another dude with thick eyebrows!
Stop making fun of Master Gai!
Haha, so nice to be young! Bring it all on.
Let‘s check each other‘s progress from training.
Hmm you foot-dragger, I won‘t show you any mercy.
Don‘t be kind to each other in fight.
Yes! Test your actual strength!
It‘s your first Quest! Don‘t worry, you won‘t encounter any Ninja in a Level C Quest.
Please put your life on protecting me until I complete building the bridge back home!
Hey little fellow, are you still ok?
Don‘t worry, Jonin‘s here…
The enemies seem too strong for a Level C Quest. I‘ve got a bad feeling…
The mask… You‘re from Kirigakure Hunter-nin Corps…
Impressive!
Get down…
Ha! It‘s Zabuza Momochi, the Missing-nin of Kirigakure!
Such a powerful rival… I guess grandpa hid lots of details of this Quest. What an Awful Consignor!
Could you tell me how to get to Konoha Village?
You look very annoying, as grumpy as Sasuke. Do you think everybody owes you?
Hahaha, then I won‘t be kind to you any more.
Hey, take is easy, you can‘t just start hitting me like this!
Master, what do you mean by "get ready"?
Of course to train harder and get better!
Enemies will come back any second. I must strengthen your power before that happens!
Climb the tree?
Do you seriously consider it training?
Let me finish! You must gather Chakra at your feet before you climb. Chakra control is the basic technique of Ninjutsu.
Haven‘t done this for a while. Ok, I‘ll supervise your training!
Great, everybody‘s working hard. Let me check your progress!
Ahh! Can‘t move…
I warned you not to train too much to walk, such an unbelievable idiot!
Haku… You met your match.
It seems like…
Let‘s have a fierce fight.
I know it‘s a bit sudden, but I‘ve just recommended you to qualify for the Chunin exam…
What?
Here‘s the application forms.
You, the one with vicious eyes, wait a minute!
Let‘s fight now! What do you think?
Hehe, you asked for it yourself!
Who are you? How dare you pretend to be one of us!
Didn‘t expect to be caught out… How did you realize I‘m not real?
Naruto can never remember such a long pass code…
Sorry for involving you in this.
Places for the Chunin exam are limited. Since you get the opportunity, have a good fight!
I don‘t really want to show my Kugutsu no Jutsu before the final round, but it looks like I have no other choice.
Sakura, go get some more fish, 3 are not enough!
Temari, can you help me fan up a fire?
My fan is not for this!
Seriously, you‘re in picnic mood?
You again… The destination is right there. I must continue!
Go ahead.
Get out of my way if you want to live.
Congratulations for getting through the qualifying round of the Chunin exam. Have a good rest and get ready for the finals.
Lalala, I‘m going to relax with a nice bath!
Hey buddy, are you planning on something bad again?
Wow! (Nose bleeding)
Naruto! This bath is for ladies only! I won‘t forgive you if you dare to step in!
Hey, guy over there! What do you think you‘re doing?
My dear lord, so loud… What if someone finds us!
Wow, this super pervert has some tricks. He took care of the pervert so easily.
Who the hell is that big toad? Who are you?
Good question. Wait a moment!
I‘m Gamamaru, also known as the Great Toad Sage, from Mount Myōboku. Nice to meet you!
Hey! Pervert Sage, what shall we do now? He was supposed to train me! What have you done to him!
Well, you can train with me.
What are you doing! Idiot! How many times do you need me to tell you, use all the Chakra you have in your body!
So annoying! I‘m already doing my best!
Again!
Ok!
I‘m very much looking forward to this match!
Naruto…
There‘s not much hope if Naruto is the opponent…
Anything you want to say?
I said already, I‘m gonna defeat you for sure!
If you don‘t launch an attack, I‘ll start.
I can‘t let a woman defeat me! I have to fight back!
Very sorry I‘m late. Shall we start?
… Bring it on!
Kakashi, is it?
Yes, it‘s Genjutsu! Enemies are attacking!
A windmill not turning isn‘t worthy a watch.
In brief, I‘m gonna use Destroy Konoha to spin the windmill.
Sorry, the chunin exam has finished.
Your new Quest is to handle attacking Otogakure.
This level A Quest is the toughest one after Zabuza.
What did you do to Sasuke!
We‘ve done him no harm. It‘s his own will to follow Orochimaru Sage.
Bullshit!
Not one person in the whole world really needs me.
Don‘t get closer!
Kabuto, I knew you‘re not good!
Sasuke, why are you leaving us!
I can‘t get the power I want here. I‘ll follow Orochimaru to seek real power.
Itachi, can‘t believe it‘s you!
Leave me alone, I don‘t want to kill you.
My name is Kisame, nice to meet you.
What nice? It‘s time to finish you!
It seems like they won‘t let us leave the village.
Don‘t push too hard. Your movements are too obvious.
It‘s a deal!
Let‘s go look for Tsunade. I‘ll train you hard on the way!
What! Why do I have to go on this resource collecting trip with you Pervert Sage?
It‘s not a general resource collecting trip. There‘s one lady I want to interview. Let‘s go look for her.
Tsunade, I can give your brother and your lover a second life if you heal my hand!
How dare you mention them. Go away!
Tsunade, we want you to be the 5th Hokage.
No way, I refuse!
It reminds me of before when you refused my friendship.
Hokage is nothing. Only idiots are dreaming to become one!
How dare you insult Hokage! I‘ll beat you even though you are a girl!
Manhebi and Orochimaru, Katsuyu and Tsunade, it‘s been a while.
Jiraiya, is it your alumni meeting?
Haven‘t been out for so long, don‘t start with such a terrible joke. It‘s time to put a stop to it.
I don‘t want to be stuck in Konoha with you guys any more. Leave me alone.
We‘re your friends in Konoha. Why are you treating us like this?
Forget about it. I will bring you back even if I have to force you!
After two and a half years, everything‘s still the same. I missed it so much!
Show me your progress. Same rules as last time, try to grab the bell in my hand.
Master, the ending of Icha Icha is…
No, not good for you, don‘t listen!
Something‘s fishy here!
Shikamaru and Temari, are you on a date?
You must be kidding! Why would I date a guy like him?
Here‘s a new Quest for you. Quickly go reinforce Sunagakure.
Is there something wrong with Gaara?
Kisame! I‘m surprised!
Master Gai, do you know each other?
Hehe, it‘s time for me to avenge myself for your kick last time.
Not just Gaara, he won‘t let us go either!
I‘ll defeat you!
Listen, exchanging glances with him is dangerous!
Gaara is right behind this rock.
We have to break the Seal first.
Bastards! What did you do to Gaara?
I‘m asking who the hell you are!
Naruto, we‘ll meet again.
Your conversation sounds interesting. May I join you guys?
Damn! It‘s a trap!
Sasuke, I knew it‘s you.
I remember you wanted to be a Hokage?
Instead of looking for me everywhere, you‘d better spend your time on hard training.
Don‘t you think I‘m not qualified to be a Hokage if I can‘t even save my friends?
I still can‘t stop him. I‘m… Too weak…
No matter how many tears you drop, it can‘t bring Sasuke back.
I also… I also wanna become stronger together with you!
Akatsuki is finally taking action.
Such a big crisis, but also a good opportunity to finish them all. We‘d better hurry up.
I think you‘re taller, more or less?
You‘re still the same, especially your pair of cold eyes.
I hope you won‘t suddenly scream loud and rush me.
You know nothing about me.
Come to stronghold of Uchiha Clan alone, let‘s put a stop to this.
I found it, the leader of Akatsuki is in the Land of Rain. Let me go for investigation.
It‘s very dangerous for you to go there alone. Sorry for always putting you in an unfavorable situation.
If you were also killed, I…
Let‘s do it your way. As an all time loser, you bet on my death. Then when I come back…
Haha, just kidding. A dumped guy will grow stronger.
